Summary: the ufo was a disc shaped ufo and sped off
divs: Sighting Details I was just coming out of the grocery store and I was in my car when I saw a disc shaped ufo. It was being chased by 2 helicopters and 1 jet. It hovered for 5 seconds, then it started flying at about 300 mph. Then it made a sonic boom. After that, it started going faster and time started to slow down the ufo suddenly dissapeared. The helicopters circled the area and then headed west. That night the ufo was shown on the nightly local news.
